DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria lean subject : age 2550 20 < BMI < 25 waist circumference < 94cm Inclusion Criteria obese subject agematched healthy subject 30 < BMI < 40 waist circumference > 102cm Exclusion Criteria lean obese subject : Physiological psychological disease Allergies food intolerance highfat meal Vegetarians Chronic intake drug Smokers Diabetes mellitus Type I II Debilitating kidney disease Debilitating liver disease Clinically establish coronary heart diseases Ingestion vitamin dietary supplement course study
